prod_short_desc: Intercept The Shocker and take down the Vulture!
prod_long_desc:
Team up with Spider-Man and Iron Man to catch up with The Shocker’s Van and tackle the Vulture’s attacks in this thrilling LEGO® Marvel Super Heroes Beware the Vulture set. The Shocker’s Van opens up for easy play and includes a mounted, adjustable 6-stud rapid shooter, a buildable rifle and buildable tech egg, while Vulture’s wings have 2 detachable stud shooters. Includes 4 minifigures with assorted weapons and accessory elements such as Spider-Man’s firing Power Blasts.
Build an epic chase scene featuring Spiderman and Iron Man vs. The Vulture and The Shocker!
Featured in the sensational Marvel Studios film Spiderman: Homecoming
Includes minifigures of Spiderman and Iron Man with a van that opens, 6-stud rapid shooter and boosters for Iron Man’s feet and hands
LEGO Marvel Super Hero building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Van measures 2” high, 5” long, and 2” wide. The Vulture’s wingspan measures 2” high, 7” long, and 1 inch wide
375 pieces – for boys and girls between the ages of 7 and 14 years old
